channel.title: 🏢 Department of Computer Science, University of Helsinki on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Department of Computer Science, University of Helsinki on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Non-geodesically-convex optimization in the Wasserstein space
item.description: A novel semi Forward-Backward Euler scheme provides convergence guarantees for non-geodesically-convex optimization in Wasserstein space, advancing both sampling and optimization.
